Applied Calculus Ch. 3 Sec. 1 Prob. 8
========================================================
```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(ScoreR)
startProblem("AC-3-1-8")
```
Following the notation in the book, we'll write the equation $y = 5x + 13$ to stand for a function of $x$, that is, $y = f(x) = 5x + 13$.

```{r include=FALSE}
prob1=selectSet(name="3.1.8", totalPts=1, "5"=TRUE, "18"=FALSE, "5x"=FALSE, "x + 13"=FALSE)
```
Find the derivative $dy/dx$ of the function $y = 5x + 13$. `r I(prob1)`

`r I(endProblem())`
